articles.title: Flo-Jo, the woman that even the fastest living woman Shericka Jackson couldn't beat - The Indian Express

articles.content: The fastest living woman! The commentator would boom just as Jamaicas Shericka Jackson blurred along the track, arms pumping, knees kicking, to an incredible time of 21:45 to take gold at the World A… [+8549 chars]
